entry.title: 文章发布测试
entry.content:
$$
考研真题\int_{0}^{1}\frac{\sqrt[m]{\ln^2(1-x)}}{\sqrt[n]{x}}dx
$$

$m,n$都是正整数，问积分敛散性与$m,n$的关系。

瑕点有$x\to 0^+,1^-$
$$
①x\to 0^+,\frac{\ln^{\frac{2}{m}}(1-x)}{x^{\frac{1}{n}}}\sim \frac{(-1)^{\frac{2}{m}}}{x^{\frac{1}{n}-\frac{2}{m}}}\sim (\frac{1}{x})^{\frac{1}{n}-\frac{2}{m}}
$$
$\frac{1}{n}-\frac{2}{m}<1$时收敛。
$$
②x\to 1^-,\frac{\ln^{\frac{2}{m}}(1-x)}{x^{\frac{1}{n}}}\sim \ln^{\frac{2}{m}}(1-x)
$$
$\frac{2}{m}$无论取何值都收敛。

$\because \frac{1}{n}\le 1,\frac{2}{m}>0,\therefore\frac{1}{n}-\frac{2}{m}<1$恒成立

综上，该积分的敛散性与$m,n$的取值无关，该反常积分是收敛的。

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
